level.heading: Transfer of functions of Alcoholic Beverage Control Division of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs.
level.text: All positions, property, records, and unexpended balances of appropriations, allocations, assessments, and other funds available or to be made available to the Alcoholic Beverage Control Division of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs relating to the duties and functions assigned herein are transferred to ABRA.

level.heading: HISTORICAL AND STATUTORY NOTES
level.text: D.C. Law 13-298 amended and enacted into law Title 25 of the District of Columbia Official Code.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following ยง 25-101.
